title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie beyng infourmed, that in some partes of her realme, sundrye either ignoraunt or malicious people doe spread rumours abroad, that the base testons of foure pence halfepeny should not be currant after the end of Ianuary next [...]
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],
